Review.Titre: Very difficult to navigate app
Review.Contenu: Very difficult to navigate app. Not what I was looking for. Tried to cancel and was still charged. Very poor experience.

Review.Titre: This app is a great idea but…
Review.Contenu: This app is a great idea and my kids quickly like the idea; however, the cards don't work. It's so frustrating and I don't have time to sit on the phone with any type of customer service. I just need things to work, especially when I'm paying for it.

Review.Titre: Ghosting
Review.Contenu: This app was not working out for my kids so I discontinued it a month after signing up. In September of this year I was charged an annual fee on an account that I had closed. I contacted the company but they have ghosted me and did not acknowledge my request for a refund. This shows lack of integrity and very disappointing.

Review.Titre: I went in ap to approve payment
Review.Contenu: I went in ap to approve payment, thinking I'd have the chance to put check marks besides what payments were approved for what child.  Instead, it sent an amount to be paid that was incorrect.  Emailed help desk and called customer service and never got a call back.

Review.Titre: Save yourself the trouble and don’t use Busy Kids…
Review.Contenu: The program is great but trying to use the card is horrible. The customer service for the card is horrible. No responses from phone calls to Busy Kids and days before anyone responds to emails. We paid for an annual membership and ended up just losing our money and closing the account because it wasn’t worth the hassle. Super disappointed.

Review.Titre: "Disappointed with Busy Kid's Customer Service and Limited Banking Options for Children"
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed with the customer service provided by Busy Kid. Despite being initially impressed, I found myself waiting for 10 minutes on a chat queue (#1). As my daughter grew older and I decided to transfer her savings to a traditional bank account, I was informed that this option was not available. Consequently, I now have to incur ATM fees to withdraw her cash and deposit it into a real bank account. I am dissatisfied with the way these situations were handled. While Busy Kid serves as a basic means of monitoring a child's spending, it proves challenging for a responsible child who wishes to progress and transition to the next phase of financial growth.

Review.Titre: Card, Security Issues and NO response from Customer Services.
Review.Contenu: We were finding a lot of issues with the Busykid application and card. 1. Card Refusal 2. Being allowed to be used Online purchases from age-restricted sites3. Fee \ Charges being levied on the Child's account4. No security protocols in place to ensure card security.5. The phone application security can easily be bypassed if you have the correct training. 5. Support for the card and services is terrible; I've waited over a week for a response to an email, and still no reply.

Review.Titre: It has been good, but may be time to move on
Review.Contenu: Busy Kid is a great application for my daughter who is learning about money, credit, saving, and investing. The customer service part of this company is glitchy and sometimes the card has glitches.  It's important that my daughter is able to use her card when I am not with her and sometimes the site is glitchy and so is customer support.

Review.Titre: Dollar limits = useless app
Review.Contenu: Pointless dollar limits on every kind of action make the whole thing useless. What a shame.The "solution" offered below of dribbling funds from bucket to bucket over time is not convenient or practical. I don't want "protection" from myself. I want a functional app. GreenLight.com has no such limits.

Review.Titre: Predatory practices and no Support
Review.Contenu: It is a really good concept, but the execution is very poor.Support is non existent. I have only one question - instructions on how my kids can login to see their balance.... None of my emails were answered. The chat bot on the website produces only generic answers...Another serious issue - they charge $0.50 for every declined transaction. So, without the ability to see their balance, my kids just keep trying ...We spent probably $60 or more in the last 3-4 months on decline fees. I have a feeling, the company does it on purpose (preventing kids from reviewing their balance and charging outrageously high "decline fees"... None other debit or credit cards charge these fees. But this company is hunting our kids for these $0.5)

Review.Titre: Customer support was very unfriendly…
Review.Contenu: Customer support was very unfriendly and didn’t seem to care that I was having issues. I was given an answer of “we can unlock your account and you can try again or we can just cancel your account”. I understand there may have only been two options but it was completely unprofessional the way it was presented. I kept getting the same response about my funding account not working but no real help on how to fix it.

Review.Titre: haven’t gotten our cards
Review.Contenu: So far we still haven’t received our ATM cards and it’s been over a four weeks since the first order and now we are still waiting for the second set of cards.  Customer service is responsive but aren’t expediting the process at all and our daughter went to camp without any ATM card.  We are very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Hidden Fees
Review.Contenu: I originally got this app to help my kids make money for their chores but in the last year or two busykids has been adding more and more fees. At this point it’s easier for me to go purchase a visa debit from Walmart and my kids won’t be losing money to these “fees”

Review.Titre: Clunky, Unintuitive and Delayed...
Review.Contenu: The interface is incredibly non-intuitive. I think I have approved things or transferred things and it turns out they are "pending" for a long, long time.  I just want to be able to get the funds needed to the kids when I want without having to go through some long, cumbersome process.

Review.Titre: Absolutely the worst company
Review.Contenu: Absolutely the worst company. I regret getting my kids the cards. Will be canceling when I can and leaving the worst reviews everywhere possible. Customer service is atrocious and rude. They don't have your back with purchases.

Review.Titre: nobody picks up the phone
Review.Contenu: nobody picks up the phone, only a machine.I already left messages, emails, nobody answers.In the meanwhile they charge me for a renewal that was never authorized.  Their phone number AZ time is only a machine.

Review.Titre: My tweens racked up hundreds upon…
Review.Contenu: My tweens racked up hundreds upon hundreds of dollars in $0.50 insufficient funds fees because who knows what music & game subscriptions and trials they signed up for continually try to charge their accounts.

Review.Titre: My son's card was charged nearly $100…
Review.Contenu: My son's card was charged nearly $100 in fraud charges. After calling Busykid to remedy the fraudulent charges, they contracted with Cliq to investigate. Months later, Cliq sends a letter stating "we have thoroughly investigated your claim and determined that no error has occurred." We never claimed there was an "error," but rather fraud. And I'd love to know what kind of "investigation" was conducted, because we did not make 16 purchases at Apple.com. We will be canceling these cards immediately. Please do yourself a favor and do not do business with this company.

Review.Titre: No help from the customer care
Review.Contenu: No help from the customer care. A supervisor with the name CS was the worst customer service representative  I have ever chatted with till date. He was rude and did not deserve to be in customer service at all. I have saved the chat I had with him. The customer service did not had any control in resolving the issue. I wud hv not gone ahead with this if I had not paid for it. Bad exp but still a customer

Review.Titre: Good service until you need support.
Review.Contenu: I had been using BusyKids for awhile for my 3 kids and loved it until I needed support. Two of them recently got jobs and no longer needed the card or the chores. I submitted a request to have the two cards cancelled and their accounts as well. Specifically stating only the two and not the third child. The confirmation was only for the two kids and things seemed good. Until a day later when my third child tried to use his card and was declined. Only to find out someone messed up and accidentally cancelled his card too. Wife had to leave work in order to go to my child and pay for his items he needed. Now I’ve cancelled everything with them and won’t use again or recommend.Update 9/15/23: I was contacted with an apology and was considering changing my review until the customer support person suggested for me to change my review in an email. Appears they only cared enough to apologize so that I’d change this review and not about the mistakes and time/embarrassment it caused.

Review.Titre: Busy Kids is not a trusted platform
Review.Contenu: Busy Kids is not a trusted platform. Everything is fine until you encounter a problem. Their customer service number is a dead end. When you call, you will never get a person on the line. It goes straight to prompting you to leave a message or email. No one will ever call you back! When you email them you will hear back the next day, sometimes a few days. You will get very vague convoluted responses. Is this company ran by robots? I wouldn’t recommend Busy Kids.

Review.Titre: Not being clear about annual cost
Review.Contenu: Not being clear about annual cost. Making it hard to contact customer service effectively. Hard to cancel the service. Providing an at best untransparent service to both kids and parents. I had high hopes but am very disappointed

Review.Titre: High Membership/User Fee
Review.Contenu: I shouldn’t have to pay such a high fee for my child to hold this card or for replacement cards. The app is bland and there’s no real perk to maintaining this particular card. Will cancel before next renewal.

Review.Titre: Soon as I linked a bank you closed my…
Review.Contenu: Soon as I linked a bank you closed my account. I personally think it's bulls that your company gives you the option to link a bank but once you do the account automatically closes. What the f kinda crap is that? I'm one pissed mama and I have one very disappointed daughter. Thanks for nothing, your company false advertise all the companies customers!!! My advice would be Go Henry parents or Greenlight at least they don't say you can do something and then close your account. 5 STARS***** Go Henry/Greenlight 💯 SATISFACTION BUSY KID 💯 MAD AS Hello-o PARENT 🤬DISAPPOINTED CHILD 😭💔😭

Review.Titre: First Time Card Use - maybe waive the fee if the pin doesn't work
Review.Contenu: The first time my son attempted to use his card, the pin did not work. He tried several times and then he was both embarassed and got a fee. He doesn't even want to try to use it again the experience was so bad. I think, truly, it was the fee that put him over the edge towards the negative. On the bright side, it was super easy to change the pin once I called. He still has not tried it again...

Review.Titre: Closed my sons account an took almost…
Review.Contenu: Closed my sons account and took almost $200 with it saying since he is a minor there is no refund. I’m trying to get them to return money and reactivate the card. Bizarre. Never again.

Review.Titre: Held up momey
Review.Contenu: I've repeatedly contacted customer service about adding a funding source but two dozen or so emails later I still have the same issue so now busy kids is saying I owe hundreds of dollars and froze my kids freaking allowance. Why anybody would use this app idk

Review.Titre: Can't use the app.
Review.Contenu: The app isn't even working. Unable to send or transfer money to my kids. Seriously considering canceling the account. Please get the android app fixed.

Review.Titre: The money never came off my card
Review.Contenu: The money never came off my card It was scheduled for the 15th of this month to come off and it wind up saying that it was going to come off the 17th and it never came off and it still wanted to charge me 84 cents each transaction already paid for 3 months so I wouldn't have to pay the change not happy with this busy kid thing

Review.Titre: App not best
Review.Contenu: App not most user friendly when it comes to loading directly.  If you just do a transfer it splits in the different options.  Also missing alot features in mobile app like set pin or resting so you have to wait on hold to talk someone which is not quick to get thru.  Had issue resolved but no could tell me why card was decline though app said it was active.  They would tell me it active over phone. It's a great concept just not friendly for use.  Maybe after a few more months but given frequency of use makes it hard.  I don't use it every day, it's a tool my kids save money on it and use maybe 1x a month.

Review.Titre: I don’t recommend this company
Review.Contenu: I don’t recommend this company. They charge excessive fees - NSF even when it’s the vendor who is charging the incorrect amount. For a kids card this is absolutely ridiculous !  In response to the company’s comments, our child did have sufficient funds. Your system is seriously flawed, and blaming customers is unacceptable! Greenlight doesn’t pull this attitude or excessive fees on their customers!

Review.Titre: It is a debit card that won’t take a…
Review.Contenu: It is a debit card that won’t take a pin and gets denied when money is there then get a fee for trying to run it again when you know money is there.

Review.Titre: Your customer service reply time is way…
Review.Contenu: Your customer service reply time is way too long, when we have a problem it takes days to fix! Half the time the card is not accepted in the platforms my child likes to use

Review.Titre: BusyKid is not a good service
Review.Contenu: BusyKid is not a good service, extremely hard to contact support. Transferring money back to your account is not a ray process

Review.Contenu: There's no way to get money off of a spend card. Also, no way to set up weekly chores where the child gets to just do a chore on any day. It has to be on specific days. I asked if my feedback could be submitted for improvement ideas and they said no.

Review.Titre: The fees are unclear
Review.Contenu: The fees are unclear. We will be leaving busykid. I am extremely irritated at the service amd lack of clarity.

Review.Titre: Think it's kinda shady I get charged…
Review.Contenu: Think it's kinda shady I get charged for the account before I even received the debit card to use. Still have yet to get the card I ordered over a month ago for my son soo...what's the deal?? I mean $4-$5 a month isn't expensive I'm just not into wasting money for a service I'm not receiving and/or using.

Review.Titre: I was charged $48 for a subscription…
Review.Contenu: I was charged $48 for a subscription that I had no idea about!! I was never sent a notification or anything. I never even knew about it when I signed up a year ago.

Review.Titre: The get cash function doesn’t work
Review.Contenu: The get cash function doesn’t work. You cannot get thru to the phone number. Not for me. I had $1200 at stake and no way I can get on the phone with some one. They can spend a day texting me nonsense but cannot answer a phone for a 5min conversation. I finally had to beg for them to call me. This is simply not good enough, not when there are thousands of dollars at stake.

Review.Titre: I tried to give my grandson $5
Review.Contenu: I tried to give my grandson $5. Instead it transferred as $500. While it was still pending I tried to contact BusyKid to fix the mistake. No one got back to me and the transaction went thru. All they had to do was answer the phone!  Instead they had me leave a message and they never called back.

As of today, 10/5 I still have not received the new card. I will be canceling my membership and going elsewhere. Hard to believe that 2 cards did not make it to me. I get mail everyday.

Review.Titre: Very restrictive and charges fees
Review.Contenu: Very restrictive and charges fees. No way to just put money into savings and also no way of transfering money back to parent account. DO not recommend

Review.Titre: If I could give 0 starts I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give 0 starts I would! Do not use this company! It automatically closed my account as soon as I linked my bank account. I had money in my account so I'm not sure why this would happen & I really do not care why. I should've chosen greenlight or gohenry to begin with! My daughter's are so upset. As am I. Don't bother leaving a reply saying "I'm so sorry for your experience with us. Your account was closed for such and such reason......." Save your BS for someone else. I will make sure I let everyone I recommended busy kids to that I was WRONG & to NOT use this company! I'm cancelling my bank card and ordering a new one. It's definitely Suspicious that you close my account soon as I link my bank.

Review.Contenu: Customer service has not been helpful on the past. Service causes interruptions in home network and devices.

Review.Contenu: We haven't gotten our card in the mail at all and when I called customer service the lady was extremely rude. I will probably cancel the subscription and find a different company.

Review.Titre: I tried setting up BusyKid MANY times…
Review.Contenu: I tried setting up BusyKid MANY times for SEVERAL weeks... yes, weeks. I added all of my bank information, and it was good for a few days and my kids were so happy to get their cards in the mail. Until... everything fell apart, and my account said set up/payment failed. I emailed and called many, many times, trying to get help. Tried setting my personal checking up once again more than once. Finally, after a lot of time spent trying to figure out what the problem was, a BusyKid representative said they don't "connect" or work with my bank. That would have been great information to know weeks before I spent so, so, so much time trying to set everything up over and over again. I would give BusyKids one star or even less.

Review.Titre: AWFUL!!
Review.Contenu: AWFUL!!! The customer service is absolutely terrible. Making contact or canceling is a nightmare and don't expect to get your funds back if you cancel. Still trying to get money back in my bank account after canceling the account. Do not do business with this company. If I could give 0 stars I would.

Review.Titre: I needed assistance with changing my…
Review.Contenu: I needed assistance with changing my bank account, because I accidentally linked the wrong account, and my account was immediately closed down and customer support gave no help to fix the problem.Horrible company... Horrible customer service...Update: my subscription did NOT fail... I had just paid it. It had not been a month yet. And I wanted to change the bank account because I didn't realize which account I had originally linked. Yes it had no funds, that's the reason I wanted to change it. DuhAs you can see, the company tries to cover up its short-comings

Review.Titre: They closed my account and then said…
Review.Contenu: They closed my account and then said cause I asked which I didn't then said I had tried to add money which didn't go through and it was extreme like really it's a joke right when my 50 in reference bonus huh seems. FishyAnd firstly that was someone failed attempt to pay my son's card not me trying to add it. Not to mention your stating false information cause I got emails and screenshots of what I am saying can you show me what your saying cause I been writing support with 50 in referrals that just go away sorry Mike your representative told me

Review.Titre: It sucks kids can’t withdraw money they…
Review.Contenu: It sucks kids can’t withdraw money they have to send money back to the parents and wait for it to post to their account for the parents to give it back to them in cash ….cards can’t be used on cash app or aren’t recognized at some places

Review.Titre: The idea is good
Review.Contenu: The idea is good, but in practice, it can be tedious and our son's pin doesn't work at most places so the card is useless to us and him.  We always end up having to send cash with him in case the card doesn't work with defeats the purpose of having the convenience of the card.

Review.Titre: Issues
Review.Contenu: We have recurring charges that we are not sure where they are from and therefore can't stop them. Fees occur when this happens. There are often times when the card fails to work. The customer service rep subsequently claimed it was my son not knowing how to use a pin or running it wrong. We do know how to use a card, thanks. I'm not satisfied with how this card works, but it helps to be able to put money on their accounts for lunch, grocery pickup, etc..

Review.Titre: Customer service was unhelpful in…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was unhelpful in answering my question regarding a replacement card that was taking too long to arrive. The response was simply to wait a few days and then call back. At the very least, the rep could have let me know that the card had shipped and that it should arrive within a few days. It was extremely frustrating.

Review.Titre: New platform, new problems
Review.Contenu: The switch to this new platform, and the annual subscription was not welcome. All (visable) progress with my child's stocks within the app were reset, and those stocks in stockpile are now functionally orphaned because they will need to be sold. As soon as we find a better alternative, we will be moving away from busykid.

Review.Titre: Vendor not being approved and declining transactions
Review.Contenu: Card was declined with sufficient funds and when I inquired about it I’m told by customer service that vendor “is not compatible with BusyKid”. The vendor was Venmo. How would I know a popular vendor like Venmo would not be compatible ? On top of that we got charged for the decline..although the funds were sufficient.

Review.Titre: Upset about the limited options…
Review.Contenu: Upset about the limited options regarding stocks…that was the advantage of when we purchased.  I will be exploring other options.

Review.Titre: Poor service when fraud happens
Review.Contenu: The difference between my bank card and this card when fraud happens is significant! Once I reported the fraudulent charges I had to file a dispute for each one which took weeks and all that time my son was out the money stolen from him. I suggest looking at other cards.

Review.Titre: There are quite a few improvements that…
Review.Contenu: There are quite a few improvements that could be made. Investment matching. Credit building and checks. A better dashboard that shows all available tasks including ones that are not for that day (general tasks).

Review.Titre: Find something else.
Review.Contenu: This card is a giant pain in the ass.  It never works right, I end up with "credits" that should just go back to my payment source that don't.  I think you are basically trying to scam parents.  I just haven't had the time to figure out something better.

Review.Titre: Not worth the price in my experience
Review.Contenu: Not worth the price in my experience. When my daughter would go to use it, it got rejected more often than not (even while using the correct card).

Review.Titre: Fee to transfer money is very high
Too many changes in terms and pricing
Review.Contenu: Too many changes in terms and pricing. Increases in prices then told you get a locked on price then it changed again. Very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Different amounts charged
Review.Contenu: Called re: a charge that differed from the actual cost. Representative unable to answer the questions was like he was reading a script and not hearing any of the questions

Review.Titre: I was intending to switch my grandson…
Review.Contenu: I was intending to switch my grandson to Capital One before I incurred the fee. Your card is too fee laden, and this is my last year with you all.

Review.Titre: card hard to use
Review.Contenu: card hard to use my children are not allowed to use their card at certain shops even though there is money in their account. It is very embarrassing to have your card declined when you knowly have money.

Review.Titre: Transferring money off card
Review.Contenu: Once the money is transferred to the card it is too difficult to get back. You have to either spend it or withdraw it. I should be able to transfer it back to the child’s or parents account. The card and the account are too separate…need to do a better job linking them.

Review.Titre: I have had such a horrible experience…
Review.Contenu: I have had such a horrible experience with customer support. When I received the cards. They were not the cards I ordered and when I sent money using the bonus  option My children card kept declining. I notified customer support let my name and number. This company never called me back but instead sent a email stating the card worked. I emailed over 6 times before they resolved the issues

Review.Titre: WHY MONTHLY FEE?
Review.Contenu: WHY THE MONTHLY FEE? I SERIOUSLY HAD TO SEE PROS AND CONS MYSELF. LOTS OF OTHER COMPANIES OFFER NO INTEREST, NO FEES, UNLIMITED TRANSFERS AND STILL OFFER CASH BACK OF 5%. ITS TOO SOON TO TELL WHAT MAKES BUSYKID STAND APART FROM THEIR COMPETITION.

Review.Titre: My child never received the card…
Review.Contenu: My account was never properly verified SO money was pulled from my account  and put on child's card..But child NEVER RECEIVED THE CARD. I had to cancel account due to unresolved issue. Could not SPEAK to anyone; Only Email back and forth. Finally TALKED TO TRUIST BANK who put a stop on the account since I did not receive the child's debit card  from busykids. They could not ever resolve this but DID FIND A WAY TO CHARGE ME (?)

Review.Titre: It’s difficult to reach an actual…
Review.Contenu: It’s difficult to reach an actual person. I’ll have to check to confirm the actual date

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I have been with busy kids for over a year.  Things were going well until recently at least twice when I have transferred money to one of my kids accounts (I have 2 kids on the account) it double charged me.  I tried reaching out today and they refuse to give me a call to discuss.  They will only email and Cindy continues to say it’s because one of my kids have the same pin and maybe she sent money to herself be mistake.   This makes no sense with when the transactions happen only when I transfer the money and it always immediately a double transaction (same amount of money twice at the same time)!  I have requested a call back but they only keep emailing me.  Then they tell the transactions are coming from my home address every time when I did my last transaction while at my work address and no one was home at the time.  Either their system needs updating or something is not right with their app.  This is frustrating and I’m thinking it’s time to look elsewhere!

Review.Titre: Need more simplicity
Review.Contenu: I’ve been having trouble figuring things out. Like loading money to the spend account. Having trouble with my daughter using the pin. I feel like it needs a little more work. Simplicity

Review.Titre: This card is very confusing
Review.Contenu: This card is very confusing. I am sure it will work when we figure it out, But it has been trial and error. My son has had his card declined multiple times due to invalid pin. One was set, but may not be the pin that is requested? Like I said we are learning by trail and error. I have read the FAQ, but doesn't really explain our situation. The icing on the cake, we are getting charged every time the pin is wrong. Our education is now coming at a price and... no one to talk to.

Review.Titre: Card rarely works
Review.Contenu: Card rarely works, we have to email asking why.  Again our Daughter tried to use her card twice this week and it dod not work.

Review.Titre: LOAD CARD ERROR
Review.Contenu: The app would not allow the transfer from SPEND to LOAD CARD. Also, the pin number does not work on the card. This has not been a positive experience so far.

Review.Titre: not worth it
Review.Contenu: not worth itI do not find this app user friendly at all. My son didn’t know his pin and because he tried several times they charged us a fee.

Review.Titre: Initially ordered 2 cards for my grand…
Review.Contenu: Initially ordered 2 cards for my grand boys 11/27 so they would be here for  ChristmasAfter 15 days had to call and reorder cards to be mailedFinally got them Christmas Eve and Boys were out of tien

Review.Titre: We haven’t received her new card yet-…
Review.Contenu: We haven’t received her new card yet- even though you have the same address on file that we’ve used for 2 years.

Review.Titre: You are charging too much for…
Review.Contenu: You are charging too much for overdrafts!

Review.Titre: Owner Did nothing To Improve The app I lost money
Review.Contenu: I'm glad That The Owner Awnsered But He didn't Say He was adding The Notification Like what I Think MY Son Was not The problem It was me But Also The app Should have told me I shouldNot Have to repeat Telling them That I have done This Aagain Now I Lost $20 Im Going To Stop Using This app IF Further looked into it is not done I'll remind My freinds To Quit using this app!

Review.Titre: Issues with Card...not using app yet.
Review.Contenu: The concept of BusyKid is great. However, it took over a month to receive the card for my son, and within a couple of weeks (before I had even given it to him), I received an email saying there would be a new card servicer/issuer and to keep an eye out for the new card. Still no new card, and I paid for the annual subscription 2 months ago. We haven't even gotten to use the app and frankly I'm hesitant to even start now.

Review.Titre: My child spent more than he had
Review.Contenu: My son Was using Busykid And he says chores Done donated all to charity So sweet :D But then I realize he Spent more money then I have! He Donated $80 Dollars My account Has $73 I think I should know if I have enough money for him to make and it should say Something like ( Uh oh Not enough money Cant do that ) But No So MY bank calls me Saying You have -7 dollars And MY cards Being Canceled do to *glitching* He clicked Pay for So many Times After it said ( Not enough money) Because it looked like enough money to him That it Allowed him and went through MY cards being cancelled Now Besides that Good app

Review.Titre: Over a month, no card
Review.Contenu: This seems like a great concept and the app is easy to use, but I ordered the card over a month ago and haven't received it yet.  Sent an email to the busykids help email, and no response. Checked my inbox and junk mail, and no correspondence regarding my card, just ads and requests for ratings.

Review.Titre: We have not been able to use the cards
Review.Contenu: We have not been able to use the cards. Every time my daughter tries to use it. It says wrong password. And it’s not the wrong password. I have even tried it. Getting frustrated with it. And i have referred so many people to this because of the concept. But now i may be getting rid of it.

Review.Titre: I think the idea is great and we were…
Review.Contenu: I think the idea is great and we were excited to receive the card. However, it arrived with my social security number printed in place of my kid's last name. Customer service didn't understand how that could happen so I got routed to another department. I am now waiting on a new card and if there are hidden fees or some such thing, I'll give up on it.

Review.Titre: Parents get charged for each credit…
Review.Contenu: Parents get charged for each credit card transaction to pay kids, unless you use a bank account. They want your user name, password and PIN. No way! To pay out on the savings, they will simply put $ back on the credit card you used and then you pay your kids cash. Setting up chores is not that intuitive first time around. Also, previously documented chores are not saved in drop downs. You have to recreate it.

Review.Titre: The app is poorly organized and…
Review.Contenu: The app is poorly organized and sometimes confusing, particularly the delegation and scheduling of chores. The spend/save/invest feature should be easier to adjust and the ability to adjust the ratios of spending to saving and investing should be adjustable, easily, from the main home screen. Too.many fees and cards should be customizable if they are priced the way they are.

Review.Titre: Easy to Give Money, Impossible to Spend It
Review.Contenu: Each time my kid has tried to use the debit card, it is declined. This is very frustrating because the whole point was for us to not have to have cash around. So instead we just have unusable money sitting in an account that we can't access. There is no info about this in the FAQs or anywhere else, as far as I can tell.

Review.Titre: Should not charge for declines
Review.Contenu: Devv can liner fees are done wrong.

Review.Titre: What's the point of paying if you don't get the card?
Review.Contenu: The biggest thing that drew us to this app was the debit card that the child can use. However, we still haven't received the card and have no idea when/if it will actually get delivered. It's been almost 2 weeks and we are still waiting. Since we do not have the card and I'm afraid of it getting lost/stolen, I'm not moving money onto it. Which means we aren't using the full features of the app so I'm feeling like paying for it was a waste. Wish we had just stayed with the free version.

Review.Titre: Funds did not load onto the card we are…
Review.Contenu: Funds did not load onto the card initially, there was a lengthy procedure to add funds to the card. I did a lot of research on this and similar cards before buying and I didn’t come across the procedure to add funds in my research and I didn’t see it included in the info that came with the card. There were also hidden fees for loading the card that weren’t clear up front. Busykid was responsive to my complaint but I can’t say I’d recommend this card based on these experiences.

Review.Titre: Hidden Fees and recurring charges
Review.Contenu: The app is good. Works great, but it charged me a recurring payment for a bonus that I sent my daughter. It also doesn't tell you about the fee it charges you to send the money to the card. It may be a small fee of like 50 or 75 cents but I'd like to know all of that before I signed up for it.

Review.Titre: App is fine, wouldn't recommend the credit card
Review.Contenu: The app is fine, could use some updates to make it easier to assign and delegate chores. I'd like it if someone marks the chore as done that it doesn't show as an option to other kids. Their credit card is also questionable, my daughter has made a few returns that haven't been returned to the card.

Review.Titre: I have not seen any reimbursement for…
Review.Contenu: I have not seen any reimbursement for the additional card that I got and the card that I did receive has it printing and a logo on it that is nothing like the picture showed. It's barely legible. The other thing that would be nice on this which is something that multiple other companies do is to have a photo of the child on the card. I want hundred percent got the runaround from this company and the company that provides the actual cards because nobody knew who should be helping me out which made it so I had to write and respond to multiple other emails. It just became a hassle hey and I do like the program but this was kind of a mess. Yet

Review.Titre: My kids have lost interest in marking…
Review.Contenu: My kids have lost interest in marking and I find it frustrating not being able to always get the payments made as quickly as I would expect.  Its hard to navigate.  If I hadn't already paid for the visa cards and didn't know how to use them without the app I probably wouldn't be using it still

Review.Titre: Good idea in theory but the execution…
Review.Contenu: Good idea in theory but the execution is flawed. Some things just don’t work and getting in touch with someone to help is nearly impossible. Can’t see the bank account as an option to load card. Just a really bad Ux and needs some more testing because many functions just don’t work.

Review.Titre: Can't give a raving review because we…
Review.Contenu: Can't give a raving review because we haven't received our cards, almost 2 months later. But you have been great about spamming me with information on how to use a card that we don't  have or requesting feedback.

Review.Titre: Web interface is useless
Review.Contenu: Web interface is useless. Phone interface is incomplete. They know this is a problem... this is a complicated solution to try to shove into a phone interface but they are hanging on by their fingernails with the attitude of we...must...make...this...fit.... you end up with features that you just can't find a second time and are nonsensical... why, because it is 23 clicks OVER THERE... if they'd just break down and let my computer with my massive screen maintain the data there, I could have lots of options and type much faster than with my thumbs.

Review.Titre: I used the app to track chores and…
Review.Contenu: I used the app to track chores and dollar value. I did use it to transfer funds because it was cumbersome to figure out how to. I had to email for instructions. Still after that I was a bit lost. I since stopped using the app & found another one.

Review.Titre: I loved the idea of this but not user…
Review.Contenu: I loved the idea of this but not user friendly at all.  Spent 3 days trying to get card loaded the 1st week b4 I had to call customer service.  He loaded it for me but when the 2nd week rolled around I was stuck again.  Not worth all the time to figure things out.

Review.Titre: I don’t like the fact that if I move…
Review.Contenu: I don’t like the fact that if I move money from the save or share accounts that it has to go back to my account to be put back on the card. Also I don’t like that when I put the allowance on the card none of it goes to the spend side of the card

Review.Titre: I still haven't received the debit…
Review.Contenu: I still haven't received the debit card, so the whole process has been slow for our family to get started. I also had trouble linking my bank account, so overall not too impressed with this service thus far.

Review.Titre: The card is an amazing teaching tool
Review.Contenu: The card is an amazing teaching tool; however you have to go through several vendors just to have a question answered. In addition, when they finally get you to the correct vendor (question not answered).

Review.Titre: Sad child
Review.Contenu: My daughter went to use her debit card for the first time and it was declined. She only purchased a $3.69 item and was super sad it didn’t work. We activated the card, so their should be no reason for this

Review.Titre: Did not receive the card
Not as good as it sounds
Review.Contenu: One of the cards I ordered didn’t show.  The hidden fees on the card are stupid. $0.50 for debit and $0.50 for declines, you’re stealing money from kids.  Will likely switch to a regular bank card.

Review.Titre: A lot of fees associated with this
Review.Contenu: A lot of fees associated with this- I get it- how does busy kid make money without fees- but there are other apps to track it and then you can simply pay your kiddo- there is a fee with everything

Review.Titre: Its all very confusing
Review.Contenu: Its all very confusing for both of us. Where do I load money? Where does it go? If he wants to spend it, where does it need to be? There are so many apps better than this one

Review.Titre: Poor customer service from BusyKid
Review.Contenu: When calling when calling BusyKid customer service for help it took way too long for me to get through to an actual person and I had to send numerous emails to get a response - not good!

Review.Titre: Just let Down
Review.Contenu: There is a lot about the app that should be more up front.  Cannot transfer funds to my own account (investment)Cannot set up my own charityGood for chores and that is about it

Review.Titre: I love and hate this....
Review.Contenu: I love the fact that my kids have their own card and that we receive them quickly thank you.But what I dont like is how when ever I do any transaction anywhere the money comes out or loads asap this takes forever i paid my kids early this morning think they would have there money they called i checked it's still pending i absolutely dont like that at all but I'll find them another card company that loads instantly I dont like pending that means that it wont be until tomorrow and they had plans today I'm uo set now I have to leave my home get cash from the atm and then meet up with my children this is highly upsetting to me but thank you anyways they were excited to get there cards I'll see if we can load them in the store if that's faster I'll keep the cards

Review.Titre: I was excited to use this app to help…
Review.Contenu: I was excited to use this app to help my children to learn about money.  I have had a hard time being able to donate the money my child wanted to donate and it is discouraging me.  When I give my permission to  allow my children to donate to a charity I shouldn't have to make the donation.  It should be taken care of by the app.  I like the way they have the stock set up that you click on it and the kid has the stock.  That was also a challenge to get set up and I accidentally sent $10 to the stock site from my child's busy kid debit card by mistake but I figured out how to do it right eventually.  The app needs to have better step by step instructions.  I'm going to continue to try and use this app mostly because I have already spent the money to get my children their debit cards and because they are excited about it.  I hope that it gets easier to use as I go along.

Review.Titre: I'm giving this 2 stars.....
Review.Contenu: I'm giving this 2 stars because my money was approved by my parent and I still haven't gotten anything and its been over 24 hours now.

Review.Titre: Who's fault is it really??
Review.Contenu: Ok, I guess I should not be surprised by doing something online that sounds to good to be true! I received the card and wouldn't you know I encountered issues from the beginning! You always have to use the pin you set up to move around the account, so when I got the card, I immediately put in my number and come to find out it was the last four of the card! I had even tried my last four of my social. Nope it's the last four of the actual card! This of course put us into being blocked! So you'd think to call the number for help right?  Nope! You have to send an email to busy kids for help. How often do THOSE get answered quickly?! Sorry, this was mainly my fault, but I need to vent! So again, I've learned folks that we really don't get things for free and things really aren't easy!!😉😜 So now we're waiting again! At least it's teaching her one thing. Patience! Maybe not me, but her! 😂😂

Review.Titre: The Busy Kid card cannot be added to Apple Pay
Review.Contenu: The Busy Kid card cannot be added to Apple Pay which is a real issue since my kids like to use some of their allowance for iPhone games.

Review.Titre: Inconvenient and slow to communicate
Review.Contenu: I ordered 3 cards for each of my children. I found it a bit inconvenient that the card issuer's customer service couldn't assist me with activating all 3 cards at once because you can only use the automated system. So, I had to hang up and call back 3 more times in order to activate each card.Not to mention it's been over 12 hrs. And I am still unable to unlock the activated cards in the app to get started. It's also annoying that communication with busykid is through email only  and once you get a response they will most likely not be able to assist you but refer you to the card issuer who has a limited function. Also, Im not sure how the kids login to there accounts to view balances because I am unable to unlock each card... I was interested in Greenlight for the kids but chose Busykid because the fees were less and the feature of donating to charities etc. is a great idea. But, at this point Im unsure how its going to work out because I am currently in the sunken place with the app.

Review.Titre: The automatic allowance only works for…
Review.Contenu: The automatic allowance only works for the one and not for the other one. I have to do a bonus transfer on every 1st and 15th.

Review.Contenu: I have not received the cards yet, 16days, some I am not able to review yet, I will give actual review when I start using it.

Review.Titre: I haven’t received my card
Review.Contenu: I haven’t received my card. It’s been 3 weeks. They said it’ll get here early September.

Review.Titre: Still haven't received the card
Review.Contenu: Still haven't received the card. I've reached out to customer service. First to update the mailing address as it was different from my billing address. Immediately, I was directed to the issuer of the card. No big deal. They said they resolved it after multiple copies of my driver license was emailed. Waited another week. No card. Reached out to customer service again. I was assured it would be here any day and they would continue to follow up with me until the card arrived. We will see how this pans out or if I will receive the card. At least customer service responds rather quickly - whether they have a resolution or not. I do sincerely appreciate that. ***edited to add that this card was ordered July 9th and the change of address was requested on July 10th. ***Update - I did receive a card and although had issues "unlocking" it in the app upon receipt, it did work the following day. With the delays aside (although a bit frustrating, it wasn't the end of the world), I personally would suggest obtaining a debit card through your financial institution. It is cool that kids can check off chores as they complete them but the same could be done via a sticker chart or any other chart. There is also a significant delay when loading the allowance to the card. I will probably cancel this and go through my bank. The customer service representatives are responsive so that is a plus.

Review.Contenu: Had issues setting up funding source. Card cannot be used with Facebook Pay.
